question.body: Which hormone(s) secreted by the anterior pituitary control(s) the function of other endocrine gland(s)?

multiple_choice.choice: All of these are tropic hormones.

response.feedback: Partially correct. Thyroid stimulating hormone is not the only tropic hormone.
Partially correct. Adrenocorticotropic hormone is not the only tropic hormone.
Partially correct. Follicle-stimulating hormone is not the only tropic hormone.
Correct. All of the hormones listed above are tropic hormones that control the function of other endocrine glands.
